entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 07:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
